code-checks.description: Configures code checks and formatting with pre-commit hook

expo-app.description: Generates and configures an Expo React Native app

next-app.description: Generates and configures a Next.js app

repo-config.description: Sets up the monorepo structure for development

react-lib.description: Generates a library according to Nx notation

react-component.description: Creates a React component in particular library

sentry.description: Creates Sentry integration for Expo/Next application

ui-kitten.description: Installs and configures UI-Kitten for Expo application

entity-api.description: Creates an API with related entities in API library. It also updates redux store middlewares, reducers

store.description: Installs and configures redux store for Expo/Next application

form.description: Generates a form schema class and adds its usage to a component or a hook

lib-tags.description: Checks and configures Nx library tags

lib-rename.description: Renames an existing library and updates imports

lib-move.description: Moves the library to a new destination.

lib-remove.description: Removes the library. Before deleting a library you must remove all references to it

auth.description: Creates auth related api libs and configures redux store
